about_the_game:
A month has passed since the battle that changed the future of doom
As if to signal the end to the peaceful days
A request comes in from the head of the witch church.

In order to stop the rituals of the zealots who are plotting the resurrection of the old dragons
I entered the dragon labyrinth again with my friends.

But what we saw there.

Betrayal of fellow man.
An abominable witch who has attained perfect immortality.
A future of doom that cannot be avoided even by looping the present.

The other option the Keeper of Time proposed to me was to jump to the past,
a thousand years ago, when my master, who had saved my life, had committed a terrible sin.

You are the present.
and a thousand years ago, before the Doomsday Witch gained immortality.
You can loop two time periods.

Those whose hearts have fallen into darkness, those who could not protect their families,
those who could not save their benefactors.

You will show the path of righteousness to those who have gone astray in the past,
and challenge the final battle against those who seek to lead the world to ruin.


Even if they are defeated and killed by monsters,
The ability to loop around the world, taking over the power of the enhanced card,
challenge the labyrinth again and again.


Change the future of another world by your choice.

■Distribution and video of gameplay

The English version of the game video is allowed.

content_descriptors.notes: Because of the theme of returning to death, there is bloodshed and violence on the level of a juvenile magazine.

detailed_description:
A month has passed since the battle that changed the future of doom
As if to signal the end to the peaceful days
A request comes in from the head of the witch church.

In order to stop the rituals of the zealots who are plotting the resurrection of the old dragons
I entered the dragon labyrinth again with my friends.

But what we saw there.

Betrayal of fellow man.
An abominable witch who has attained perfect immortality.
A future of doom that cannot be avoided even by looping the present.

The other option the Keeper of Time proposed to me was to jump to the past,
a thousand years ago, when my master, who had saved my life, had committed a terrible sin.

You are the present.
and a thousand years ago, before the Doomsday Witch gained immortality.
You can loop two time periods.

Those whose hearts have fallen into darkness, those who could not protect their families,
those who could not save their benefactors.

You will show the path of righteousness to those who have gone astray in the past,
and challenge the final battle against those who seek to lead the world to ruin.


Even if they are defeated and killed by monsters,
The ability to loop around the world, taking over the power of the enhanced card,

Change the future of another world by your choice.

The English version of the game video is allowed.
name: DUNGEON WALK2－混沌の神々－

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: The world is once again threatened with destruction by a witch who has gained immortality. In a world where only you can repeat loops, loop the present and the past of 1,000 years ago, and challenge a powerful enemy. create your own unique deck and reach deepest part of the dragon labyrinth.
